phrs.translation: 出租人, 分纱机, 隆泽光, 怎么翻译及发音

sentences.sentence: So the leaser asked:"Why didn't he greet me?"
sentences.translation: 领导：“他为什么不对我打招呼？”

sentences.sentence: For payment for oversea fans, please get information form your local fans club leaser, thank you!
sentences.translation: 有关海外古迷之缴费方式，敬请向所属地区分会会长查询，谢谢！

sentences.sentence: Secondly, generally, the leaser provide the form of contract, which mostly is favorable to the leaser .
sentences.translation: 在签订租赁合同前，通常由出租方提供合同文本，而很多租赁合同文本都是偏向于出租方的利益。
